channel.title: Steam: scanning for games updates. FOR EVER
channel.description: Ok so i just updated steam and restarted it like it told me too. Now the problem is that when i am trying to start a game, any game, it tells me that it is "scanning for steam games updates" and it just says that without end, the game does not launch. Also when i try to click some were else it makes a noise that reminds me of the Wii console and doesnt let me do anything unless cancel the scan. WTF is going on i wanna play through Dangerous World mod again and this shit happens. :'(
